question:
You recently bought a camera while travelling overseas. When you got to your destination you discovered that some important items were missing from the box.Write a letter to the local representative of the company. In your letter:
Give details of the camera and where you bought it.
Explain what has happened.
Say what you want him/her to do about it
text: I am writing this with regard to missing items in my recent purchase from your company.

I bought a camera, Cannon X90, online while on vacation, and specified the shipping address to the hotel I intend to stay in, in Rome, Italy. I received the package on Monday, May 4th when I arrived in Rome. However, something is missing in the original package.

The paper contains a warranty and user's manual is missing. Since I am not in the original country of purchase. I cannot contact the local store representative for a swift replacement on the same day. I'd like to ask you for a digital copy of the warranty and instruction manual, if possible. Thank you and I am writing for your prompt response.
